Subject: Determine SQL Connection String
Description:
Hi,
Please advise how we can see the actual SQL connection string being passed from NEA to the database.

Thank you,
Alison.
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c: Have a need to see SQL-connection string from NEA towards monitored SQL servers.
What_We_Know__c:
There are two ways the connection string may appear:
The latter is used by AllState

using SQL Auth "Setting Connection String to: 
"Data Source=REDACTED-SQLAUDIT;Initial Catalog=DATABASE;Persist Security Info=True;User ID=sa;Password=********;Connect Timeout=15"

Using Windows AUth/IntegratedSecurity: 
"Setting Connection String to: Data Source=j4ssp202;Initial Catalog=J4D_StealthAudit_AEM;Integrated Security=True;Persist Security Info=False;Password=********;Connect Timeout=15"

 The connection strings can be find in any job log by searching the content for "setting connection string to"
Solution_Comment__c:
Connection string provided:
"Setting Connection String to: Data Source=REDACTED-SQLAUDIT;Initial Catalog=DATABASE;Persist Security Info=True;User ID=sa;Password=********;Connect Timeout=15"
